title: AI Project Lead — Team Arete
highlights: Led a multidisciplinary AI research team building Stampede Predictor (real-time CV) and ATHENIS (legal NLP).
Mentored team members on ML modelling, prompt engineering, and end-to-end system design.
Coordinated hackathon submissions and dev-ops for live demos and streaming pipelines (Fluvio).

title: AI & Machine Learning Engineer — Independent / Open Source
highlights: Built and fine-tuned ML pipelines for NLP, Computer Vision, and predictive analytics using TensorFlow, PyTorch and scikit-learn.
Applied LLMs (Gemini, OpenAI, Claude) for tutoring, summarization, and reasoning automation.
Engineered data processing and evaluation pipelines (pandas, NumPy) to optimize training and model evaluation.

title: KEAM 2024 — Rank 688 (Top ~1%)
description: Secured an All-India rank of 688 in the Kerala Engineering Architecture Medical (KEAM) entrance examination among ~90,000+ candidates.

title: Student Developer — IEEE Computer Society (GEC Thrissur)
highlights: Organized ML and Git workshops and mentored students on version control and best practices.
Supported peer projects in predictive modelling and data-driven applications.

title: Stampede Predictor — Real-Time Crowd Safety
highlights: Real-time person detection using YOLOv8 and density heatmaps with OpenCV.
Risk-scoring algorithm combining spatio-temporal grid analysis and motion clustering.
Integrated Fluvio event streaming for frame-level inference and live visualization; achieved >90% detection metrics in testing.
links: Devfolio / HackHazards submission references in the HackHazards community materials (team demo / results). :contentReference[oaicite:12]{index=12}

title: ATHENIS — Legal Document Simplifier
highlights: Transformer-based clause-level simplification and semantic anomaly detection for legal text.
Real-time inference pipeline with adaptive token generation for large documents.
